i1.name: Mark of the Kindred
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Both '''Lamb''' and '''Wolf''' mark targets to ''hunt''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} on a marked target permanently empowers '''Kindred's''' abilities, as well as granting '''Lamb''' {{pp|type=Marks|75;100;125;150;175;200;225;250|4;7;10;13;16;19;22;25|formula=+75 at 4 Marks, and +25 every 3 Marks thereafter, up to 250 bonus range at 25 Marks.}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks and {{ai|Mounting Dread|Kindred}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Lamb:}} '''Lamb''' is offered a selection of enemy {{tip|champions}} to take down if she hasn't been [[combat status|in combat]] with them in the last 6 seconds. Once selected, the mark is applied after an 8-second delay and thereafter it can be collected by '''Kindred'''. '''Lamb''' gains the ability to select a new target every 75 seconds. ''Targets successfully hunted cannot be marked again for 4 minutes.''

{{sbc|Innate - Wolf:}} Starting at {{sbc|3:15}}, '''Wolf''' periodically marks a random large {{tip|monster}} within the enemy team's jungle for 180 seconds. The marked camp is highlighted on the [[Map (League of Legends)|mini map]] to both teams. Once slain, '''Wolf''' will wait 45 seconds before selecting a new target.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 4;7;10;13;16;19;22;25 ‒ undefined bonus range on her basic attacks and Mounting Dread.
Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of enemy champions to take down if she hasn't been combat status with them in the last 6 seconds. Once selected, the mark is applied after an 8-second delay and thereafter it can be collected by Kindred. Lamb gains the ability to select a new target every 75 seconds. Targets successfully hunted cannot be marked again for 4 minutes.
Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically marks a random large monster within the enemy team's jungle for 180 seconds. The marked camp is highlighted on the Map (League of Legends) to both teams. Once slain, Wolf will wait 45 seconds before selecting a new target.
The type of monster that Wolf can mark changes based on Kindred's current Marks:
* 0 : Rift Scuttler
* 1 – 3: Rift Scuttler, Crimson Raptor, Gromp
* 4 – 7: Ancient Krug, Blue Sentinel, Greater Murk Wolf, or Red Brambleback
* 8 + : Rift Herald or Baron Nashor, Dragon or Elder Dragon
i1.notes:
* {{tip|Takedown|Takedowns}} on {{tip|monsters}} occur if '''Kindred''' had damaged them within the last 6 seconds.
** This only includes if the monster was slain by '''Kindred''' or an ally.
* Only killing the large monster is required to claim '''Wolf's''' mark.
* Gaining stacks from champions that would change what constitutes as a valid target for '''Wolf''' will not affect '''Kindred's''' ability to claim '''Wolf's''' current target.
* '''Wolf''' cannot mark monsters that have been slain, even if '''Kindred's''' team doesn't know that the camp has been slain. 
* '''Wolf's''' cooldown is not displayed in-game. Combined with the above point and the target restrictions, '''Wolf''' may go extended periods of time without seeming to do anything. 
* If an enemy kills the marked target while '''Kindred's''' team does not have vision, the mark will only be removed from the map once '''Wolf's''' cooldown has expired. If '''Kindred's''' team gains vision of the camp, the mark will be immediately removed.

q1.name: Dance of Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' {{tip|dashes}} toward the target location, gaining {{sti|attack speed|{{as|25%|attack speed}}}} {{as|(+ 15% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds.

After dashing, '''Lamb''' fires up to three arrows at nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} targets, each one dealing {{as|physical damage}} upon their arrival. '''Lamb's''' current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting {{ai|Wolf's Frenzy|Kindred}} or using ''Dance of Arrows'' while inside its area will reduce this ability's {{sti|cooldown}} to an amount.
'''Lamb''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Dance of Arrows' '' dash.
''Dance of Arrows'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Lamb's''' basic attack timer.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb dashes toward the target location, gaining 25% (+ 15% per Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.
After dashing, Lamb fires up to three arrows at nearby visible targets, each one dealing physical damage upon their arrival. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting Wolf's Frenzy or using Dance of Arrows while inside its area will reduce this ability's cooldown to an amount.
Lamb can cast any of her champion ability during Dance of Arrows' dash.
Dance of Arrows resets Lamb's basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The dash does not have a fixed range, it can be directed by up to 340 units.
* The dash distance can be extended to up to 400 units when dashing across terrain.
* The cooldown will not be modified if it cannot be reduced (the current cooldown would have to be less than the reduction amount in this case).

w1.name: Wolf's Frenzy
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} As '''Kindred''' move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of ''Hunter's Vigor''. At full stacks, '''Lamb's''' next basic attack {{tip|heals}} her for up to {{pp|49 to 100}}, based on {{as|'''Kindred's''' '''missing''' health}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Wolf''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next {{fd|8.5}} seconds, separating from '''Lamb'''. '''Wolf''' [[Champion summoned units|autonomously]] attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing '''Lamb's''' attack target.

'''Wolf's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} and scale with {{as|25% of '''Kindred's bonus''' attack speed}}. Against [[monster]]s, '''Wolf''' deals 50% increased damage and his attacks {{tip|slow}} the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
''Wolf's Frenzy'' ends immediately if '''Lamb''' leaves the area or dies.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack heals her for up to 49undefined − 100undefined (based on level), based on Kindred's missing health.
Active: Wolf dashes to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf Champion summoned units attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.
Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks slow the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area or dies.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}|Monster Damage|{{ap|25*1.5 to 45*1.5}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20*1.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|1.5*1.5}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*1.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Wolf''' is {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|ghosted}} but he cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation. 
* '''Wolf''' is not able to re-target {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} if he loses {{tip|sight}} of her while he's attacking it.
* ''Wolf's Frenzy'' does not end if '''Lamb''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|18 to 14}}|From when the ability is cast}}' as '0/16.667/15.333/14/12.667/0' and riot's value '18,17,16,15,14' as '18/17/16/15/14'

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's current health)
  • Monster Damage: (+ % bonus AD) (+ % (+ % per Mark) of target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 20% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's '''current''' health)
(+ % '''bonus''' AD) (+ % (+ % per Mark) of target's '''current''' health)

e1.name: Mounting Dread
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' fires a shot at the target enemy that upon arrival marks them for 4 seconds and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 50% for 1 second.

'''Lamb's''' attacks against the marked enemy refresh the mark's duration and apply a [[stack]], stacking up to 2 times. Her next [[basic attack]] against the target while they are at 2 stacks will direct '''Wolf''' to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped at 300 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

'''Wolf's''' pounce will {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|150}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against targets below {{as|{{as|{{pp|type=critical strike chance|key=%|key1=%|15 to 15+100/2 for 11|0 to 100|formula=15% (+ 0.5% per 1% critical strike chance). ''This is capped at 100% critical strike chance.''}}|health}} of their {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb fires a shot at the target enemy that upon arrival marks them for 4 seconds and slows them by 50% for 1 second.
Lamb's attacks against the marked enemy refresh the mark's duration and apply a stack, stacking up to 2 times. Her next basic attack against the target while they are at 2 stacks will direct Wolf to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against monsters.
Wolf's pounce will critically strike for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage against targets below 0 to 100 ‒ undefined of their maximum health.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
e1.notes: * The '''bonus''' damage will not benefit from {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} unless the target is below the '''maximum''' health condition.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  50 as 50 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's missing health)

st_slices: (+ 80% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's '''missing''' health)

r1.name: Lamb's Respite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a {{rutngt|0.25}} [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]]. '''All''' units inside the zone cannot be [[Death#Ways_to_prevent_dying_by_not_losing_health|reduced]] below {{as|{{sti|health|10% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, and will become {{tip|invulnerable}} for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be {{tip|heal|healed}}, but can still {{sti|health regeneration|regenerate health|link=health regeneration}}.
All targetable units within the zone are {{tip|heal|healed}} immediately when the blessing ends.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a Unknown value: rutngt 0.25 Channel#Casting Times. All units inside the zone cannot be Death#Ways_to_prevent_dying_by_not_losing_health below 10% of their maximum health, and will become invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be healed, but can still regenerate health.
All targetable units within the zone are healed immediately when the blessing ends.
r1.notes:
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect all {{tip|champions}}, {{tip|minions}}, and {{tip|monsters}}, but not {{tip|ward|wards}}, {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or [[jungle plants]].
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect {{tip|untargetable}} units but does not grant them the {{tip|heal}} at the end of the blessing.
** It will specifically not affect champions that are {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}} from {{ii|Guardian Angel}}.
* {{tip|Execute|Execution}} effects will bypass ''Lamb's Respite'' threshold and leave the unit at {{as|1 health}}. This does not occur if the unit ''is at the threshold'', as they are {{tip|invulnerable}}.
* {{tip|Health resource|Health costs}} will ignore ''Lamb's Respite's'' threshold.
** The cost will not be paid if the caster is below the threshold.
* ''Lamb's Respite'' has no effect on {{tip|zombie state}} units.
* The effects are applied before the cast time.
r1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  100 as 100 and riot's value 0,0,0 as 0
